name: Nam Vu
about: Graduated with a Bachelor of Sc in Accounting & Finance at the City University of London, my future aspirations include becoming a Chartered Accountant and becoming a ACCA member in the future . I am currently looking for an internship or a fresh graduate job to gain experience in the financial services sector and develop my knowledge of the industry.

experiences.description:
• Support preparing financial statements of 8 different subsidiaries. 
• Analysing billable hours and allocating cost to subsidiaries.
• Assisting in estimating next year budgets for parent and other entities.
• Support preparing financial statements of 8 different subsidiaries. • Analysing billable hours and allocating cost to subsidiaries. • Assisting in estimating next year budgets for parent and other entities.

• Required strong focus, attention to detail and the ability to manage personal attitude and behaviors towards customers to achieve highest customer satisfaction. 
• Adapted and became flexible while working in a fast-paced environment while studying full time. 
• Learned to communicate and coordinate clearly with people from diverse backgrounds to increase work efficiency and prevent overload in both kitchen and food bar. 
• Flexible and experienced in several positions; thus, being able to fulfill any position allocated by the manager.
• Required strong focus, attention to detail and the ability to manage personal attitude and behaviors towards customers to achieve highest customer satisfaction. • Adapted and became flexible while working in a fast-paced environment while studying full time. • Learned to communicate and coordinate clearly with people from diverse backgrounds to increase work efficiency and prevent overload in both kitchen and food bar. • Flexible and experienced in several positions; thus, being able to fulfill any position allocated by the manager.

educations.description:
Graduated with a Bachelor of Science with Honours in Accounting and Finance, Class II Upper Division.
*Achievement: Overall grade: 
• Introductory to Financial Accounting (82%) 
• Intermediate Financial Accounting 2 (71.5%) 
• Introduction to Visual Basic (70.7%) 
• Introduction to Finance (71.5%)
• Company Valuation (78%) 
• Corporate Strategy (70%) 
• Professional Skills (70.5%) 
 
Final exam: 
• Intermediate Financial Accounting 1 (71.3%) 
• Management Accounting (74%) 
• Strategy for Business (75%) 
• Taxation (69.5%) 
• Financial Markets (70%)

• 50% scholarship for 2 years covering both tuition fee and living expense. 
• Achieving A* in math (+85 on 6/6 modules) and B in Further Math.
